settings.eael_dch_first_title: A Web Development and AI-ML Enthusiast

settings.editor: A 21 year old who loves crafting websites and has a keen interest in Generative AI and Machine Learning

Hi there I am a 21 year old pursuing Bachelor's in CSE(AI-ML) at New LJ Institute of Engineering and Technology. I have a (current) CGPA of 8.75.

 I always believe in practicality, walking with the famous quote "Theory can only take you so far", I am enthusiastic about Web Development and Machine Learning and have done various types of projects for the same.

I am also passionate about fitness, I love to play Badminton and Cricket.

I am a hard working goal oriented person with utmost curiosity to learn but procrastination and time management are my hurdles.
